place_info.title: Dr. Jash Ajmera | Psychiatrist and Psychotherapist in Surat | Sadbhav Neuropsychiatry Clinic
place_info.address: 4th Floor, Someshwar Square, 208, University Rd, opp. Aagam Heritage Bunglows, Someshwar Square,Opp. Someshwar Enclave, bungalows, Surat, Gujarat 395007, India

reviews.snippet:
my wife schizophrenia  suffering from three months his treatment taken other doctor. treatment was highly cost and various types tablet was use treatment but problem was not solved .  increase the complicate in patients was done by doctor. other side effects was increase in patients totally he was experiment in patient.
my time and money was totally waste.me and my family too much mentally disturbed.
me finally taken decition change a doctor and finally me given the second opinion Mr Dr. jash ajmera sir .his treatment was very good effect in wife within eight to ten days   very simple and low cost, effective treatment given.
Dr. jash Ajmera sir is very good knowledgeable, expertise in psychiatry , politeness and listener person. Dr jash Ajmera sir is meet God person for me l am proudly feel for to choose the psychiatry Dr jash Ajmera sir

reviews.snippet: I am incredibly grateful to Dr. Jash for providing the best care and treatment for my father. His expertise in psychotherapy is truly exceptional. Thanks to his dedication and compassionate approach, my dad has made a full recovery and is doing perfectly fine now. Dr. Jash is undoubtedly one of the finest psychotherapists we have ever met. Thank you, doctor, for your outstanding support and life-changing treatment!

reviews.snippet:
A truly knowledgeable and talented doctor.
Touchwood, Dr. Jash managed to normalize a major health issue my father-in-law was facing — and that too within just 6 months. It was something unimaginable for us, but he made it possible. We are deeply grateful for his expertise and care.

reviews.snippet:
"To all those reading this, I would highly recommend seeking mental health support, counselling and therapy services. My experience at this psychiatrist clinic has been truly life-changing.
The team is compassionate, professional, and deeply understanding. They provide a safe space to open up, and their guidance has helped me navigate through difficult times with more clarity and strength. Whether you're dealing with anxiety, depression, stress, or just need someone to talk to, this clinic is a great place to seek support. I'm incredibly grateful for their care and expertise."
